EmailTemplate.subject: Take action now - Submit your rPOS upgrade form
EmailTemplate.textOnly: NCR is very proud to continue our support of Popeyes restaurants globally as an approved supplier for rPOS hardware and installation services. We are pleased to help Popeyes franchisees with all their in-store technology upgrade needs. WHAT’S NEXT? Click here <[[https://email.ncr.com/NjA1LUJRWS03NDAAAAF_IZU8ICbLHwuk2eoBOjFDacj6QOyEsHMo_LiNwotrc2gPB9gcyHwfUXdu8hYKhsO_CEOZpyo=]]> to submit your request to be included in the Popeyes rPOS Upgrade. A single submission will enable you to include all sites within your organization. While on the page please enter the requested information, placing a comma between each site in the National Store Number (NSN) field. Once you complete the information requested, simply press SUBMIT and we’ll get the ball rolling! Remember you only need to submit one form for all your sites! After the form is submitted, an NCR Representative will contact you to discuss your restaurant’s technology installation plan. Feel free to reach out to your Popeyes Account Executive, Lee Park by email lee.park@ncr.com or at 770.299.6667 if you have any questions.
